name: Gelsemium
descr: [Gelsemium](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0141) is a cyberespionage group that has been active since at least 2014, targeting governmental institutions, electronics manufacturers, universities, and religious organizations in East Asia and the Middle East.(Citation: ESET Gelsemium June 2021)

ESET Gelsemium June 2021.description: Dupuy, T. and Faou, M. (2021, June). Gelsemium. Retrieved November 30, 2021.
